channel.title: cs50 on Alex Shook
channel.description: Recent content in cs50 on Alex Shook

item.title: The Floor is Lava
item.description: Recently I’ve had a bunch of time for side projects so I thought I’d take a computer science class. I was looking for a fairly rigorous one and didn’t mind picking up some other languages. Harvard’s CS50 at edX has great reviews, so that’s the one I started. Our first assignment was to build something in Scratch, which I have never used before. It was a bit cumbersome because I’ve never programmed in a language like Scratch before.
